name: PixiaAI
description: AI that can generate art, create NFT collections, staking contracts and much more! Pixia is fully compatible with most NFTs platforms. Choose the creator fees and trade your collection on the number 1 NFT platform: OpenSea. Our platform will guide you through the process of creating a customized contract that meets your specific needs. Whether you want to set your own APR, customize your token rewards, add boosters to your miner, or make any other changes, we have you covered. With Pixia, you can trust that your NFT staking, Token staking and Miner contract will be tailored to your exact requirements, ensuring maximum efficiency and profitability. Add utility on your collection with your personal NFT staking smart contract. So if you want to get the most out of your community endeavors, be sure to check out Pixia platform today!
